description:
its now version: 4.0.4
but it in snap, 3.5!
I have used it in the past. It 's full-featured. I believe it's the best out there.
This is just what I wanted! Synchronize subtitles easily.

I used a lot this great tool on Windows, I am happy to see it for Linux. It is full featured subtitling program, the best I've seen (I tried many).
Thank you very much sir Nick (and everyone else involved) for the years of dedication and really listening and helping everyone to achieve professional level of subtitles!
summary: Top subtitle editor, much better than any other

description: I loved the app, I could get my work done easily!
there is problem with arabic and persian texts.... they dont appears corect in app

I only use Subtitle Edit to extract embedded subtitles and it is excellent for accomplishing this. I used to go to my Windows virtual machine to extract subtitles. Then I stumbled onto the install for Linux. Thank you very much for making this available on Linux!

i like this app so much and i'm using it on my windows machine, but the issue here on ubunto is it doesn't support arabic and according to the web site arabic needs a special font , is anyone have a solution for this problem
coll app for edit  movie supptitle and for free power linux  freedoom
The only downside is that the Linux version is not updated regularly, as the main (windows) version does.
summary: Absolutely the best software for subtitle edition
I use it on Windows, very well, so I install a ubuntu verion

description: Es la mejor herramienta que he encontrado para editar sustítulos para videos, en Windows?️, pero en Ubuntu?️ a sido una desilusión, no se permite o no se puede descargar diccionarios en español, por lo cual no se puede ejecutar el corrector ortografíco. A ello debo agregar que todos los editores de sustitulos que prové en linux se adolecen de lo mismo y busco una solución y la verdad no la encuentro en ningun lado, que pena.

despues de un tiempo deja de reproducir el video, se cuelga y ya no se cierra ni usando el administrador de tareas.

En windows es una maravilla, en xubuntu no tanto.
Funciona genial, traduce muy fiel de ingles a español, el subtitulado se realiza barbaro, felicitaciones!!!
